title: Lithkren Vault

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Lithkren Vault is an underground research facility located in the ruins of a dragonkin castle on Lithkren. During the Dragon Slayer II quest, it is opened with the dragon key, in which the player, Dallas Jones, and Bob inadvertently release the dragonkin Zorgoth and his creation, Galvek. Seven old notes are found here, of which four can only be obtained after completion of the quest.

Lithkren Vault
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
Floors1
LocationLithkren
InhabitantsDragons
MusicThe Forsaken
Map
Advanced data
Typedungeon

The Lithkren Vault is an underground research facility located in the ruins of a dragonkin castle on Lithkren. During the Dragon Slayer II quest, it is opened with the dragon key, in which the player, Dallas Jones, and Bob inadvertently release the dragonkin Zorgoth and his creation, Galvek. Seven old notes are found here, of which four can only be obtained after completion of the quest.

In the north-east corner of the Vault, next to the pool, a machine can be found that can enchant a digsite pendant to allow players to teleport outside the Vault. Another machine can be found in the centre of the Vault to turn hydra leather into ferocious gloves if a hammer is carried.

Adamant and rune dragons can also be found roaming the west and east wings of the facility, respectively, behind the red barriers. These barriers can only be entered once Dragon Slayer II has been completed.

The mural between the two metallic dragon chambers can be interacted with to check the player's killcount for those two dragons.

The '''Lithkren Vault''' is an underground research facility located in the ruins of a [[dragonkin]] castle on [[Lithkren]]. During the [[Dragon Slayer II]] quest, it is opened with the [[dragon key]], in which the player, [[Dallas Jones]], and [[Bob (cat)|Bob]] inadvertently release the dragonkin [[Zorgoth]] and his creation, [[Galvek]]. Seven [[Old notes (Dragon Slayer II)|old notes]] are found here, of which four can only be obtained after completion of the quest.

In the north-east corner of the Vault, next to the pool, a machine can be found that can enchant a [[digsite pendant]] to allow players to [[teleport]] outside the Vault. Another machine can be found in the centre of the Vault to turn [[hydra leather]] into [[ferocious gloves]] if a [[hammer]] is carried.

[[Adamant dragon|Adamant]] and [[rune dragon]]s can also be found roaming the west and east wings of the facility, respectively, behind the red barriers. These barriers can only be entered once Dragon Slayer II has been completed.

The [[mural]] between the two metallic dragon chambers can be interacted with to check the player's killcount for those two dragons.
